item.title: Installing Linux on HP 246 G6
item.description: Trying to speed-up my notebook HP 246 G6, I decided to upgrade my HD to a SSD. While at it, I have also decided to switch from Windows to Ubuntu. However, things did not go as smooth as I thought they would. Firstly, I could not flash a new Ubuntu image successfully on my 16GB CruzerBlade thumbdrive. I used the Balena Etcher electron app. In case you have never used it before, just issue the following in the command line to get it running:
